Test Name: Hemophilia A F8 Gene, Intron 22 Inversion Mutation Analysis (Prenatal)
Specimen Type: Amniotic fluid or chorionic villus sampling (CVS)
Purpose: To detect the intron 22 inversion mutation in the F8 gene for prenatal diagnosis of Hemophilia A.
Container: Sterile container appropriate for amniotic fluid or CVS (e.g., sterile screw-cap tube/transport media)
Equipment: PCR machine, electrophoresis apparatus, microcentrifuge, pipettes and tips, DNA extraction kit, gel documentation system
